nodes.text: This gaderffii may have once belonged to Raito, a Tusken Raider who was said to have slain a Jedi. His tribe died out sometime around the Great Sith Wars, and his gaffi stick came into the possession of another tribe's Storyteller, who may have given it to Revan.

Raito's Gaderffii is only available to Revan if he gives a krayt dragon pearl to the Sand People chieftain of the Sand People Enclave, in order to be allowed to see their Storyteller. Once that is done, Revan then must slay the Storyteller in order to acquire it.
